listing.summary: Edinburgh Sports Club is a premium private members' rackets and sports club located in the West End of Edinburgh. It offers six glass-back squash courts plus a hardball doubles court, three floodlit outdoor tennis courts, three fully covered floodlit padel courts, and a dedicated table tennis facility, alongside an on-site gym. The club features a licensed bar, restaurant with weekday lunches, café-style lounge and social spaces, with coaching programmes across all racket sports available to members and non-members. Recognised as the "Home of Scottish Padel", it hosts regular tournaments, mix-ins, leagues and social events fostering a strong multi-sport community.

source_info.note: Data extracted from official Edinburgh Sports Club website, specialist padel and sports directories, Scottish Squash events calendar, accommodation and transport sources, and mapping/geocoding references. Coordinates are approximate and derived from mapping sources rather than official club publication.; Processed by extraction on 2025-12-09 00:20:04

other_attributes.membership_model: Premium members-only venue with some activities (coaching) accessible to non-members
other_attributes.booking_system: Court and coaching bookings organised via ClubSpark and club's own online booking interfaces
other_attributes.coaching_access: Coaching programmes open to both members and non-members; booking managed via ClubSpark registration
other_attributes.events_calendar: Regular sports and social events listed on club's calendar and 'What's on?' pages
other_attributes.corporate_hire: Restaurant and social areas available for private hire for parties and special occasions
other_attributes.location_setting: Situated on an island within the Water of Leith World Heritage area, accessed from surrounding West End streets
other_attributes.equipment_shop: Rackets, balls and accessories available on-site with member discounts
other_attributes.accommodation_note: Padel directory notes 'Accommodation Available', likely referring to linked or nearby options rather than club-owned rooms
other_attributes.national_events: Hosts Scottish Squash events including 'ESC Junior Gold' tournament
other_attributes.facility_hours_note: Practical hours for specific facilities (bar, restaurant, coaching, court access) may differ from general 09:00–22:00 hours, especially weekends or public holidays; users should check current schedules via club calendar or phone

entity.amenities_summary: Licensed bar, café-style lounge and restaurant with weekday lunches. Social spaces include lounge, café seating and barbecue area. Equipment shop with rackets, balls and accessories available with member discounts. Changing facilities on-site. Restaurant and social areas available for private hire for parties and special occasions.
entity.tennis_summary: Three floodlit outdoor tennis courts. Coaching programmes available for adults and juniors with qualified coaches. Member play includes casual play and internal matches.
entity.gym_summary: On-site gym available to members with structured fitness facilities.
entity.padel_summary: Three fully covered, floodlit padel courts. Recognised as "Home of Scottish Padel". Coaching, tournaments, mix-ins and social activities available for all levels. Coaching open to members and non-members via ClubSpark booking system.
entity.parking_and_transport_summary: Ample on-site parking available for members and visitors, with free parking confirmed for event attendees. Located in Edinburgh's West End within walking distance of Haymarket rail/tram interchange (approximately 15–20 minutes walk). Approximately 14 minutes walk from West Maitland Street bus stops and about 5–20 minutes from Princes Street and Edinburgh Castle depending on start point.
entity.squash_summary: Six glass-back squash courts plus one hardball doubles court. Structured coaching programmes available for adults and juniors with qualified coaches. Regular tournaments, mix-ins and internal matches for members.
entity.table_tennis_summary: Dedicated first-class table tennis facility available for members.
